channel.title: Need help with potions

item.title: Need help with potions
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

here is the potions i made:

		case 121:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 0);
			sendMessage("You drink the attack pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 115:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 2);
			sendMessage("You drink the strength pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 127:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			currentHealth += 15;
			if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
				currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
			sendMessage("You drink the restore pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 133:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 1);
			sendMessage("You drink the defence pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 139:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 5);
			sendMessage("You drink the prayer pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 145:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(30000, 0);
			sendMessage("You drink the super att pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 151:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 7);
			addSkillXP(300, 10);
			sendMessage("You drink the fishing pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 157:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(30000, 2);
			sendMessage("You drink the super str pot and throw the vial away");
			break;
		case 169:
			setAnimation(0x33D);
			animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750;
			addSkillXP(300, 4);
			sendMessage("You drink the ranging pot and throw the vial away");
			break;

how do i make them giv temp levels instead of xp?
i use devolution 7.0 as source

Read full topic
